slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Fetch the provided Devdocs resource. Slugs are the first path entry in the Devdocs URL. For example, the slug for: `https://devdocs.io/gcc~12/` is `gcc~12`. Mutually exclusive with `All` setting, set only one option. Either this setting or `All` must be configured.

all_flag.title: All
all_flag.description: Fetch all Devdocs resources, and produce one ZIM per resource. Mutually exclusive with `Slug` setting, set only one option. Either this setting or `Slug` must be configured.

skip_slug_regex.title: Skip slugs regex
skip_slug_regex.description: Skips slugs matching the given regular expression. Do not set to fetch all slugs. Only useful when `All` is set.

file_name_format.title: ZIM filename
file_name_format.description: ZIM filename. Do not input trailing `.zim`, it will be automatically added. You can use placeholders, see https://github.com/openzim/devdocs/blob/main/README.md. Defaults to devdocs.io_en_{clean_slug}_{period}

name_format.title: ZIM name
name_format.description: ZIM name. You can use placeholders, see https://github.com/openzim/devdocs/blob/main/README.md. Defaults to devdocs.io_en_{clean_slug}

title_format.title: ZIM title
title_format.description: ZIM title. You can use placeholders, see https://github.com/openzim/devdocs/blob/main/README.md. Defaults to {full_name} Docs

description_format.title: ZIM description
description_format.description: ZIM description. You can use placeholders, see https://github.com/openzim/devdocs/blob/main/README.md. Defaults to {full_name} docs by DevDocs

long_description_format.title: ZIM long description
long_description_format.description: ZIM long description. You can use placeholders, see https://github.com/openzim/devdocs/blob/main/README.md. Defaults to no long description

logo_format.title: ZIM illustration
logo_format.description: URL to a custom ZIM logo in PNG, JPG, or SVG format. You can use placeholders, see https://github.com/openzim/devdocs/blob/main/README.md.

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: List of semi-colon-separated Tags for the ZIM file. You can use placeholders, see https://github.com/openzim/devdocs/blob/main/README.md. Defaults to devdocs;{slug_without_version}

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`
